title: Bug 104630: Column icons don't show up in connecting to Derby database
description: When connecting to a Derby database, the column icons do not appear as expected.
OB: When connecting to a Derby database and creating a dataset, the column icons are not visible.
EB: When connecting to a Derby database and creating a dataset, the column icons should be visible.
SR:
1. Create a new project.
2. Create a new report.
3. In the Data Explorer view, create a new Data Source to connect to a Derby database using the following settings:
   - Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver
   - Database URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui
   - User Name: root
   - Password: root
4. After setting up the Data Source, create a dataset.
5. In the Edit Dataset window, select Query.
6. Perform the necessary query operation.
